title: This game is a joke
body:
First day back after not playing for months. This game is a joke. Everyone has bad days and I understand that. Hear me out though.

1. Pay to win or grind till you achieve the "meta" champions.  Just to rank up with. C'mon seriously?

2. Toxic players. Out of the 3 games I've played "to get back into things" Toxic players everywhere on both teams.

3. Imbalance of champions. In most games I've played like Overwatch or CS-GO its based on skill level on the free to play characters or weapons. In this game, the simplest of champions can be played with the "correct" items, and if you go something non meta for fun, well its not fun getting dominated and seeing a grey screen most of the game. 

4. Just isn't fun anymore playing this. I've came back to play to assist my brother with climbing and seriously it feels like I'm playing in a landfill of garbage. Just doesn't have the feel or the rush that I've experienced in other games. 

5. This is related to the imbalance game-play but should tanks destroy adc's super easily? Should say Heimerdinger that builds ZZ Rot + Rylais  + liandries survive through my lethality an take several hits just for him to die when hes an AP Caster not a tank. Doing as much dmg as a AP caster but as tanky as Gnar lets say. 

6. Waste of time, this game is mostly now, dying and looking at a grey screen for max of a 1 min? Wut? Seriously. Sure its 10 seconds at first an builds up but still. When I can pretty much "toss it on the ole winnie" and can come back before Im back into the game. That's sad, People with ADHD or mental impairment that that effects their focusing ability. 30 Seconds can feel like decades. Icould be doing something else with my time rather than sitting in a waiting to respond just to die again to imbalance "meta" champions.

7. Talking about "meta" its a guideline for champions of what is better right? Like in Overwatch there's a meta (Like junkrat, soldier, symmatra and doomfist )but at least I can play my favorite hero like (hanzo, tracer, and reaper) and still do good if I have enough skill with him/her. In this game there's none of that. 

Last and finally, I had a blast playing this game and could't believe I wasted so many hours on this game an paid money just to quit. Lesson learned.

Thanks for sharing your games and time with me and take care! Thanks for reading!

Hope to see some of you in the future! :D

 **I QUIT** 

Cya <3
